New Records: Nikola Jokic scored 46 points and had 10 rebounds
Key Match Events: Michael Porter Jr. added 28 points and 10 rebounds for Denver
Devin Vassell missed a contested layup, but tipped in the rebound, to tie the game at 108 with 14 seconds remaining in regulation
Jokic missed a 19-footer over Wembanyama with two seconds remaining to close regulation
Zach Collins and Russell Westbrook each received a technical foul in the first quarter after taunting one another
Post-Match Reflections: Jokic had two rebounds and Westbrook one as the Nuggets put up four shots on the possession after stripping possession from Wembanyama
Miscellaneous Highlights: Victor Wembanyama finished with 20 points and 23 rebounds for San Antonio, but was scoreless and without a rebound in OT
Wembanyama has 57 double-doubles in 101 career games
The teams split the home-and-home series on consecutive nights
Wembanyama averaging 30.6 points and 11.7 rebounds in his last nine games
Others: The Denver Nuggets host Boston on Tuesday. San Antonio opens a four-game trip in Chicago on Monday.
Takeaways: Denver's five-man bench accounted for 18 points and 21 rebounds. San Antonio's reserves had 43 points
